Class PublisherUtils

  • public class PublisherUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for DataPublisher.

      static class  PublisherUtils.WorkUnitStateSuccess
      Implementation of Predicate that checks if a given WorkUnitState has a WorkUnitState.WorkingState equal to WorkUnitState.WorkingState.SUCCESSFUL.

      • splitExtractsByPredicate

        public static PublisherUtils.SplitExtractsResult splitExtractsByPredicate(com.google.common.collect.Multimap<gobblin.source.workunit.Extract,gobblin.configuration.WorkUnitState> extractToWorkUnitStateMap,
                                                                          com.google.common.base.Predicate<gobblin.configuration.WorkUnitState> predicate)
        Given a Multimap of Extracts to WorkUnitStates, filter out any Extracts where all of the corresponding WorkUnitStates do not meet the given Predicate.
        • The filtered Extracts will be available in SplitExtractsResult#getFiltered()
        • The Extracts satisfying the predicated will be available in SplitExtractsResult#getRetained()
